abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by the American Composers Orchestra, conducted by George Manahan, at the World Financial Center as part of music festival Sonic: Sounds of a New Century.
snippet: The new festival Sonic: Sounds of a New Century concluded with a program of broad, cinematic works at the Winter Garden atrium.
lead_paragraph: The new festival Sonic: Sounds of a New Century concluded with a program of broad, cinematic works at the Winter Garden atrium.
